text: The 2007 Tour de San Luis was a men's road cycling race held from 23 to 28 January 2007 in Argentina. It was a multiple stage race over a prologue and five stages with a total of 625 kilometres. ==Stage summary== {| cellpadding="3" cellspacing="0" border="1" style="background:#f7f8ff; font- size:95%;
